Need help with:

  • Declaring a Major or Minor
  • Changing a Major or Minor
  • Semester Course Planning (Grad Plan)
  • Clusters
  • Fast Grad
  • Track Adjustments
  • Vertical Credit Applications
  • Waive or Substitute Courses

The Satellite Academic Advising Center for our college is located in Austin 106B.  They can be contacted at 208.496.9880 or e-mailed at cpseacademicdiscoverycenter@byui.edu.   You can also visit their website at Academic Discovery Center


The following majors can find help with their academic plans at this office:

  • Architectural Technology
  • Construction Management
  • Automotive Technology and Automotive Technology Management
  • Chemistry, Biochemistry, and Chemistry Education
  • Computer Engineering
  • Computer Science
  • Electrical Engineering
  • Earth Science Education
  • Geology
  • Interior Design
  • Applied Math and Math Education
  • Civil Engineering
  • Mechanical Engineering
  • Welding and Fabrication Technology Management
  • Physics and Physics Education
  • Web Design and Development
